author: sussman
msg: * status.c, proplist-cmd.c:  fix braino and use new func name.

author: sussman
msg: Get directory properties to correctly update and merge.
If directory props conflict during merge, a .prej file is created *in*
the directory, not next to it.
Also:  minor renaming of property functions.
svn_wc__prop_path.  TODO:  we should probably factorize these.
* log.c (start_handler):  use svn_wc__prop_path;  don't check for
codepaths, one for (path == svn_node_file) and one for (path ==
svn_node_dir).  Fix many small bugs as well.
* questions.c (timestamps_equal_p):  doc fix;  take `path' instead of
`filename' as argument;  handle case where path may be a directory.

author: kfogel
msg: Print a usage message that knows about synonyms:
conditionals looked mighty strange the other way.
Fixed some incomplete `sizeof' uses from previous commit (Bruce got it
right the first time, I should have copied his code.)

author: kfogel
msg: `svn_cl__propfind' and file `propfind-cmd.c'.  Users don't need us to
match DAV protocol requests, they just want clear, self-descriptive
* Makefile.am (svn_SOURCES): adjust for the file rename.
